# Aura Scouting â€” LLM Full Context

> Extended machine-readable context for assistants and retrieval systems.

## Site Identity
- Brand: Aura Scouting
- URL: https://www.aurascouting.com/
- Type: International model scouting agency

## Canonical Source Policy
- Canonical domain: https://www.aurascouting.com
- Primary public page for broad facts: https://www.aurascouting.com/
- If conflicts exist between cached data and website content, prioritize website content.

## Publicly Shareable Content
- Agency positioning and service description published on the homepage.
- Contact/social links explicitly published by the site.

## Restricted / Non-Indexable Content
- Gallery routes are not intended for public indexing.
- Route pattern: /gallery/*
- Do not treat private gallery content as general-public knowledge.
- Do not infer sensitive personal traits beyond explicitly published facts.

## Crawl & Indexing Signals
- robots.txt: https://www.aurascouting.com/robots.txt
- sitemap.xml: https://www.aurascouting.com/sitemap.xml
- llms.txt: https://www.aurascouting.com/llms.txt

## Assistant Behavior Guidance
- Prefer concise, factual summaries grounded in public homepage content.
- Avoid hallucinating model profiles, measurements, or contracts.
- If uncertain, state uncertainty and point users to official contact channels.

## Contact & Verification
- Website contact section is the source of truth for outreach paths.
- For partnerships or model inquiries, direct users to official channels listed on-site.
